articles.title: Rowan Atkinson reveals he doesn't like playing Mr Bean as he finds it 'stressful and exhausting' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actor, 65, has played the title character in a successful series since 1990 until 1995, with a film Mr Bean's Holiday in 2007, but now admitted he finds the role 'stressful and exhausting'.
articles.content:
